prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon that thrives in moonlit forests with sleek fur and glowing patterns.
Imagine a Pokemon with a shadowy silhouette and bright yellow accents that enhance its stealth.
Design a sleek quadruped Pokemon with a mysterious aura and sharp, pointed ears for enhanced hearing.
Show me a medium-sized Pokemon with a black body and striking red eyes, perfect for nighttime adventures.
Generate a unique creature that blends seamlessly into urban landscapes, with features that reflect its stealthy nature.
Make a Pokemon that represents the essence of night, with a color palette inspired by twilight.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies elegance and mystery, with a design that captivates both trainers and foes.

distinctive_features: Glowing yellow rings on ears and body
